ygData.msgSnippet: Fine, but don t be surprised if I kill you! Sinesis said to Blizzard, coughing a few times. Ah, never mind that last sentence, I need help, too. Sinesis

"Fine, but don't be surprised if I kill you!" Sinesis said to Blizzard, cou=
ghing a few times.

"Ah, never mind that last sentence, I need help, too." =
Sinesis said...
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: ilovealllizards 
  =
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, July 13, 2000 12:36 AM
  Subject:=
 Re: Neo Beast Wars


  *Blizzard stopped reaching for Sinister's pieces wh=
en she saw Sinesis picking his parts up* Blizzard: Please let me help... *B=
lizzard says to Sinesis*
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: THECOD=
E 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Thursday, July 13, 2000 12:14 AM
 =
   Subject: Neo Beast Wars


    Deemos helps Inzola back to their ship and=
 he starts to repair her, but to no avail. Deemos, very hurt himself, went =
to the Predacon base.

    "My wife, you see she in hurt, and I need to use=
 your CR Chambers, I have been told that this is the base of the mighty Hel=
l Beast, how can I help you, Hell Beast? Just heal Inzola and myself!" Deem=
os called out to Anyone in Hell Beast's base.

    Sinesis slowly crawled a=
long, pushing Sinister's parts. Sinesis stopped every mile to catch his bre=
ath, his jets her wrecked. He kept going and going and going.

    Plintiss=
a seen a letter from Dracona, saying she had retruned to base. Plintissa sh=
rugged and walked along her way. Artist tripped her up and walked on ahead.=
 Plintissa felt like crying again, this is the one she loved? Artist laughe=
d and went on his way.

    Dracona picked up the device, but suddenly, the=
 device exploded, sending a fireball into the Predacon base. (Megatron's ba=
se) Dracona gasped. She had better be going now. She slowly started to snea=
k away.

    The Radicons hurried on their way, maybe some other team would=
 apreciate their skills, like the Alliance. Airbomber just hoped that Infec=
tra would come with them.

    Lightmare's spark joined the Matrix, she is =
DEAD.

    Gangon's spark hovered in front of BrightBlade, swirling around =
her over and over again.
